description: Calculate Damerau-Levenshtein distance. Only ASCII strings are supported.
Calculate Levenshtein distance. Only ASCII strings are supported.
Calculate Hamming distance. Only ASCII strings are supported.
Calculate Jaro-Winkler distance. Only ASCII strings are supported.

Convert the input string from UTF-8 into pure ASCII by converting all non-ASCII characters to some combination of characters
in the ASCII subset.
